name: Fistful of Kremlinks: CARNAGE MODE
description: Fistful of Kremlinks is a top-down two-stick shooter (although it uses WASD and the mouse) set in a sci-fi post-apocalyptic alternate reality. CARNAGE MODE is Fistful of Kremlinks' endless arena of enemies and powerups. The full single-player storyline mode is still in development, but CARNAGE MODE lets you demo the gameplay and some of the weapons.
